attributes.action: Restore collection and return of wheelie bins from and to the users property.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: .... as was the case for the old style bins. The current method leaves bins obstructing pavements and at the mercy of strong winds. Bins are often blown into roads. We are receiving a poorer service at an ever increasing cost and doing most of the work the refuse collectors used to do.
